overview: Mr. Martin Levetin has held many significant industry positions throughout his esteemed career. Prior to joining Strix he was VP of NeoReach Wireless, where he pioneered the municipal wireless business, establishing a key position as a leading municipal wireless operator. Mr. Levetin was the founder and CEO of Evergreen Open Broadband, a pioneer in the wholesale wireless model, CEO of Sharegate and was the founder and COO of CopperCom, where he pioneered a new class of integrated voice-data DSL products.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President, Sales and Marketing
